content: Hi, I'm new to this group so apologies if this is not the correct method. I have been experimenting with a class of students using the public HAPI FHIR server. Everything was going great... but, is there any chance that this server is down? How do I find out? I keep getting 504 Gateway Timeout now.

@Teri M Sippel Schmidt Welcome :) Would be better raised on #implementers, #social or #hapi. This channel is for general announcements and triggers emails to all subscribers. Drawing the attention of @James Agnew @Mark Iantorno. Subsequent discussion on #social please.
